title: Margaret River Villa Coastal Escape near Beach
description:
Discover the beauty of Western Australia with a self-contained villa stay at Bayshore Beachside Resort, your gateway to the sprawling vineyards of the acclaimed Margaret River wine region. Stay in the striking town of Dunsborough, a West Coast paradise nestled among forest and vines, surrounded by verdant national parks, charming sandy coves and world-class gastronomy. Your villa is a breezy two-minute walk to Dunsborough Beach, so enjoy blissful days stretched out on pristine white sand while looking out onto the sparkling waters of Geographe Bay.

Wine and unwind in a self-contained beachside villa with a fully equipped kitchen, laundry facilities, gas heating or reverse cycle air conditioning and television, so you can truly relax in your home-away-from-home after a day's exploration. The resort also features a playground, games room with pool table and table tennis, a full-sized tennis court and BBQ area, ensuring there's never a dull moment during your time at Bayshore Beachside Resort.

title: Margaret River Coastal Villa Escape with Welcome Wine
description:
Discover the beauty of Western Australia with a self-contained villa stay at Bayshore Beachside Resort, your gateway to the sprawling vineyards of the acclaimed Margaret River wine region. Stay in the striking town of Dunsborough, a west coast paradise nestled among forest and vines, surrounded by verdant national parks, charming sandy coves and world-class gastronomy.

Wine and unwind in a beachside villa with a bottle of wine on arrival, a complimentary drink per adult when purchasing dinner at Clancy's Fish Pub and a guaranteed 12pm late checkout.

**Travelling with friends and family?** Check out the ultra-spacious two and three-bedroom villa upgrades.

title: Beachside Stay Near Margaret River
description: Discover the beauty and taste the fresh produce of the Margaret River region with a self-contained villa stay in the striking town of Dunsborough - home to quiet sandy coves, surrounding national parks and a plethora of quaint cafes, bakeries and restaurants. Enjoy a three, four or five-night stay in a beachside villa (group options available) at the Bayshore Beachside Resort and a guaranteed late 1pm checkout and a welcome bottle of Margaret River white or red wine on arrival.

title: Margaret River Coastal Villa Escape with Welcome Wine
description:
Discover the beauty of Western Australia with a self-contained villa stay at Bayshore Beachside Resort, your gateway to the sprawling vineyards of the acclaimed Margaret River wine region. Stay in the striking town of Dunsborough, a West Coast paradise nestled among forest and vines, surrounded by verdant national parks, charming sandy coves and world-class gastronomy. Your villa is a breezy two-minute walk to Dunsborough Beach, so enjoy blissful days stretched out on pristine white sand while looking out onto the sparkling waters of Geographe Bay.

Wine and unwind in a self-contained beachside villa with a fully equipped kitchen, laundry facilities, gas or log fires, and television and DVD player, so you can truly relax in your home-away-from-home after a day's exploration. The resort also features a playground, games room with pool table and table tennis, full-sized tennis court and BBQ area, ensuring there's never a dull moment during your time at Bayshore Beachside Resort.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Embrace the region with a welcome bottle of Margaret River wine
- A complimentary drink per adult when purchasing a main meal each at Clancy's Fish Pub
- Guaranteed 11am late checkout to make the most of your final day

**Travelling with friends and family?** Check out the ultra-spacious two and three-bedroom villa upgrades.
